title: Web-Based Educational Resource System Design: A User-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational understanding of social studies concepts
context.additional_context: Aims to develop web resources aligned with national curricula and linked to social studies, emphasizing content design connected to learners' daily lives.

learning_goals: Learners can derive three or more functional requirements for a web-based educational resource system based on user needs analysis
Learners can produce mobile-optimized screen prototypes following learner-friendly interface design principles
Learners can develop social studies content plans reflecting educational policies (9-year consistent curriculum) and local community contexts
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
